about_the_game:
Inspired by The Flash, BoltBreak is a wave shooter with superpowers. Compete in online leaderboards and over 100 waves of enemies as you unlock and upgrade your character to become the multiverse's greatest superhero. Now Run BoltBreak, Run!


Features:
  • Combat at superspeed: Zip in and out of bad situations with lightning speed and a wide range of iconic powers like lightning blasts, speed time, and more.
  • Become a powerhouse: In BoltBreak there are over 8 unique powers to unlock each with their own fighting style. The further you progress in the waves the stronger you become!
  • Fight through the multiverse: Fight in over 8 different sandbox-style arenas each on their own earth within the BoltBreak multiverse.
  • Hours of Content: BoltBreak has over 100 waves to compete in with online leaderboards for you to become the greatest hero in the multiverse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please have most up to date video driver installed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please have most up to date video driver installed

short_description: BoltBreak is a mix between a wave shooter and a superhero game. Unlock new superpowers and climb the leaderboards as you fight through 100 waves of supervillains across 8 different earths in the BoltBreak multiverse.
